name: n00menon
description: Centralized documentation library for the n00tropic workspace

scripts.docs:build: pnpm install && pnpm exec antora antora-playbook.yml --stacktrace
scripts.lint:spell: pnpm exec vale --minAlertLevel 'warning' docs || true && pnpm exec cspell --config ./cspell.json 'docs/**/*' || true
scripts.validate: pnpm run lint:spell && pnpm run docs:lint && pnpm run docs:verify
scripts.docs:ci: pnpm run validate && pnpm run docs:build
